content: No, he’s not suggesting that all politicians are insane. Read the full article. Here are some quotes for you. No other president has come close to this disorder. Manipulation is a common trait among politicians. It’s part of the definition of politics. Bill Clinton could be deceitful. George W. Bush showed some reckless tendencies (DUIs, etc.). Barack Obama could be private and a touch arrogant. But none of them remotely qualify as mentally ill. Many politicians could be categorized as manipulative. Trump is not a typical politician, but he literally wrote books on manipulation. If you’ve decided any criticism of your leader is political, then you won’t be swayed, but really, this guy’s different.
